info.title: Einstaklingur
info.description: The API retrieves information about individuals stored in the Icelandic registry.

get.summary: Get the basic information for an individual.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: National id of the individual being fetched.

200.description: The basic information for the individual.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get the registered birthplace for an individual.

200.description: The birthplace information for the individual.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get the citizenship for an individual.

200.description: The citizenship information for the individual.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get the religion registration for an individual.

200.description: The religion registration information for the individual.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get the legal domicile for an individual.

200.description: The legal domicile registered for the individual.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get the residence information for an individual.

200.description: The residence information registered for the individual.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get the residence history for an individual.

200.description: The residence history registered for the individual.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Is the individual of legal age.

200.description: Yes or no answer depending on if the individual is of legal age.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get the cohabitation information for an individual.

200.description: The registered cohabitation details for the individual.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get a list of family members for an individual.

200.description: List of family members for the individual.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get a list of family members with detailed information for each family member.

200.description: List of family members for the individual.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get all the children the individual is a legal parent of.

200.description: List of all the children the individual is a legal parent of.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get the legal parents of an individual.

200.description: A list of the individuals legal parents.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get the list of childrens the individual has custody of.

200.description: List of all the children the individual has custody of.

204.description: List of all the children the individual has custody of.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get the parents that have custody of the child.

200.description: List of parents.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get the list of legal domicile parents

200.description: Returns legal domicile parent

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get the list of residents that live with the individual.

200.description: List of residents.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get the list of residents living in the real estate with the specified real estate id.

200.description: List of residents.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No real estate exists with that id

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get all available gender and cohabition codes.

parameters.name: tungumal
parameters.description: Text language. Not required. Defaults to IS(Icelandic). EN for english.

200.description: List of available gender and cohabition codes.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get details of cohabition code by id.

parameters.name: tungumal
parameters.description: Text language. Not required. Defaults to IS(Icelandic). EN for english.

200.description: Details for the cohabition code.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No cohibition code exists with that id or gender code.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get details for gender code by id.

parameters.name: tungumal
parameters.description: Text language. Not required. Defaults to IS(Icelandic). EN for english.

200.description: Details for the gender code.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No gender code exists with that id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get all available religion codes.

200.description: List of all available religion codes.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get details for religion code by id.

200.description: Details for religion code.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No religion code exists with that id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get all available municipality codes.

200.description: List of all available municipality codes.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

get.summary: Get the details for municipality by id.

200.description: Details for municipality.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: Municipality does not exist.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.
